item.title: How many test chambers are there in portal?
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
There are 19 actual test chambers in the campaign, but there are also the ‘behind-the-scenes’ levels and some bonus maps.

item.title: How many test chambers are there in portal?
item.dc:creator: ysrael214
item.description:
Portal 1 only have 19 chambers but in Portal 2 reveals new chambers about stuff not introduced to Chell in Portal 1. In Portal 2, some are just newly made by GLaDOS or Wheatley for Aperture Science.

Read full topic

item.title: How many test chambers are there in portal?
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Why don’t you just play and find out? It’s a short game. <4 hours.

But if you must know: 19.
